title.rendered: Why Combating COVID-19 Starts With a Clean And Comfortable Home

content.rendered:
As the COVID-19 pandemic spreads around the globe, it is vital to understand how getting your home thoroughly cleaned can help prevent the spread of the virus. The novel coronavirus is largely transmitted from person to person via miniscule droplets of bodily fluids (like saliva) that float in the air after a sneeze or cough. 

However, people are not the only carriers of COVID-19; contaminated surfaces and objects can also spread the disease. And if you touch that surface, you are highly likely to get infected as well.

This is why getting your home cleaned and disinfected by professionals is recommended, especially if someone at risk of having the virus has been in your home. A clean house not only looks and feels good, but it can protect you from catching the virus too.

Should I Hire Professional Cleaners for Air Ducts Near Me?

A lot of folks think disinfecting their homes the usual way will be enough to get rid of signs of coronavirus inside. That’s simply not true.

Disinfecting a surface means using chemicals to kill germs on surfaces. On the other hand, cleaning activity involves physically taking out the dirt, germs, and other organic matters from the surface. If disinfection is done without cleaning first, the presence of that organic matter can limit the disinfectant’s ability to eradicate germs.

So, go online and look for “air ducts near me” online to find the best professional cleaning company in your area. It is now more important than ever to hire a cleaner for your home. Here’s why:

Safe and responsible

If you hire a professional cleaner or Google “UV lights installation near me”, they will offer you expert service that is critical in a time when it’s critical to keep a hygienic home.

A virus pandemic that impacts most of the world and thrives off an unhygienic environment is not the time to skimp out on having a clean home.

Also, it might be your home but you haven’t received hours of training in cleaning every little nook and cranny of a house – unlike professional cleaners. You may not even have the proper equipment required to clean window frames, blinds, mattress, faucets, and other usually ignored things in your home.

Hiring trained and experienced professional cleaners is the best way to ensure you and your family are protected during this pandemic.

Take a break

Are you suffering from COVID-19 fatigue? Just like the rest of the world, you are probably also concerned about the pandemic and how it is affecting many aspects of your life. So, instead of putting yourself through the extra stress of deep cleaning your home by yourself, why not hire someone else to do it?

If you hire a professional company for cleaning air ducts near me, it will be one less thing for you to worry about. This way, you can check that off your list of “things-to-do” and focus on taking care of your health.

Opportunity to de-clutter

Since you are most likely spending a lot more time at home, you can finally start decluttering your home. You can sort through your basement, closet, attic, or garage like you’ve been meaning to for years.

But decluttering also creates a lot of dust, dirt, and trash which can be difficult and overwhelming to handle on your own. If you have decided to declutter, it’s best to hire a professional cleaner who will keep things clean and prevent any trash from building up.

Get Your Home Deep Cleaned to Stay Safe from COVID-19

CDC has issued a specific set of guidelines for homeowners and families to keep their home clean to stay safe from the coronavirus. If you are already struggling with taking care of yourself and your family 24/7 now that everybody mostly stays home, you are not going to be able to follow these guidelines very effectively.

Also, a fully-licensed cleaning company like United Home Services uses heavy-duty, commercial-grade cleaning supplies that you may not have access to.
